title: Win It Weekly: 3T DiscusPlus i28 LTD wheelset
content:
Win It Weekly: 3T DiscusPlus i28 LTD wheelset

How does Win It Weekly work?

Simply fill out the form below for your chance to win a 3T DiscusPlus i28 LTD wheelset.

Prize:

  • 3T DiscusPlus i28 LTD wheelset
  • Value up to MSRP: US$1999

Prize Details:

DiscusPlus i28 wheels are gravel-optimized for ultimate durability, agile handling & low weight. For the biggest tires, 650b wheels offer better handling and performance without any toe overlap.
